hero.title: Excellence in Architecture & Infrastructure
hero.subtitle: A team of professionals with over 30 years of experience in architecture, urban planning and infrastructure serving Africa’s development.

about.title: About LABANDA
about.intro: LABANDA Industrie Services supports governments, institutions and financing organizations in the implementation of major projects: cathedrals, urban planning, universities and sustainable infrastructure.
about.history_text: Founded with the vision of contributing to the sustainable development of Africa, LABANDA Industrie Services has established itself as a trusted partner for governmental and institutional projects.
about.mission_text: Design and build sustainable infrastructure that transforms communities and supports economic growth in African nations through architectural excellence and innovation.
about.vision_text: To be the leading provider of architecture and strategic infrastructure in Africa, recognized for our technical excellence and commitment to sustainable development.

banner.title: Cookies settings
banner.text: We use cookies to improve your experience and analyze site usage.

modal.title: Cookie Preferences
modal.intro: Choose which types of cookies you wish to allow. Necessary cookies are always active as they are essential for site functionality.
modal.necessary_details: Allow basic functions such as navigation and secure access to protected areas.

necessary.title: Necessary cookies
necessary.desc: Essential for the website to function (security, session, basic preferences).
necessary.details: Allow basic functions such as navigation and secure access to protected areas.

analytics.title: Analytical cookies
analytics.desc: Help us understand how visitors use the site (anonymous usage).

functional.title: Functional cookies
functional.desc: Enhance functionality and personalization (e.g., language or interface preferences).
